languages.text: "Подозреваю, этот агент желал обсудить сделку, согласно которой вы не будете мешать почтенной Инцендии Чорда душить нас угрозой голода и требовать нашей покорности? Если так, то не думаю, что буду сожалеть о смерти этого человека очень долго".

"I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."
languages.original_text: "Подозреваю, этот агент желал обсудить сделку, согласно которой вы не будете мешать почтенной Инцендии Чорда душить нас угрозой голода и требовать нашей покорности? Если так, то не думаю, что буду сожалеть о смерти этого человека очень долго".

traits.locale_text: "I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing for too long."

"I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing for too long."

"I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

"I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

"I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

languages.text: 「この諜報員は、飢餓の脅威で私達を締め上げて服従を要求した、インセンディア・チョーダの企みを妨害しないようにと取引する交渉が目的だったのでは？もしそうなら、この男の死を長く嘆くことはないだろう」
languages.original_text: "I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

traits.locale_text: 「この諜報員は、飢餓の脅威で私達を締め上げて服従を要求した、インセンディア・チョーダの企みを妨害しないようにと取引する交渉が目的だったのでは？もしそうなら、この男の死を長く嘆くことはないだろう」

languages.text: “因森蒂娅·库尔达打算用饥饿与死亡胁迫我们就范。我怀疑，或许那个代理人打算和您达成协议，要您不要插手她的计划？如果是这样的话，恐怕我并不会为他的去世哀悼太久。”
languages.original_text: "I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

traits.locale_text: “因森蒂娅·库尔达打算用饥饿与死亡胁迫我们就范。我怀疑，或许那个代理人打算和您达成协议，要您不要插手她的计划？如果是这样的话，恐怕我并不会为他的去世哀悼太久。”

languages.text: «Imagino que ese agente pretendía llegar a un acuerdo para que usted no obstaculizara a Incendia Chorda y sus amenazas con hacernos morir de hambre y rendirles sumisión. Si ese es el caso, dudo que llore la muerte de este hombre demasiado».
languages.original_text: "I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

traits.locale_text: «Imagino que ese agente pretendía llegar a un acuerdo para que usted no obstaculizara a Incendia Chorda y sus amenazas con hacernos morir de hambre y rendirles sumisión. Si ese es el caso, dudo que llore la muerte de este hombre demasiado».

languages.text: « J'imagine que cet agent voulait négocier un accord qui vous aurait {mf|convaincu|convaincue} de laisser Incendia Chorda nous affamer afin de nous prendre à la gorge et d'exiger notre servitude ? Dans ce cas, je ne pleurerai pas sa mort bien longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que cet agent voulait négocier un accord qui vous aurait {mf|convaincu|convaincue} de laisser Incendia Chorda nous affamer afin de nous prendre à la gorge et d'exiger notre servitude ? Dans ce cas, je ne pleurerai pas sa mort bien longtemps. »

languages.text: "Ich vermute, dieser Agent wollte eine Abmachung aushandeln, damit Ihr nicht in Incendia Chordas Bemühungen interveniert, uns durch die Bedrohung von Hunger zu strangulieren und unseren Gehorsam zu erzwingen. Sollte das so sein, werde ich den Tod dieses Mannes sicher nicht lange betrauern."
languages.original_text: "I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

traits.locale_text: "Ich vermute, dieser Agent wollte eine Abmachung aushandeln, damit Ihr nicht in Incendia Chordas Bemühungen interveniert, uns durch die Bedrohung von Hunger zu strangulieren und unseren Gehorsam zu erzwingen. Sollte das so sein, werde ich den Tod dieses Mannes sicher nicht lange betrauern."

languages.text: "Bu şahıs sizi, İncendia Chorda'nın bizi açlık tehdidiyle boğma ve itaate zorlama çabalarını engellemekten alıkoyacak bir anlaşma yapmak istiyordu belki de. Durum buysa adam için yas tutacağımı pek sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I suspect that this agent wished to negotiate a deal that would have you refrain from hindering Incendia Chorda's efforts to strangle us with the threat of hunger and demand our obedience? If so, I don't believe I will be mourning the man's passing very long."

traits.locale_text: "Bu şahıs sizi, Incendia Chorda'nın bizi açlık tehdidiyle boğma ve itaate zorlama çabalarını engellemekten alıkoyacak bir anlaşma yapmak istiyordu belki de. Adamın ölümünün yasını çok uzun süre tutmam o vakit."
